he Grottoes of the Nine Sages were a series of nine caves within the Horseshoe Temple Oasis in the Quoya Desert of the Hordelands during the mid 14 century DR.
Each cave was once a shrine dedicated to one of the Nine Sacred Sages of the Pathâ€”these being Chou Zhiangpen, Ta-wan, Tai Hsueh-chi, Li Chih-wu, Yao Tsung-i, Peng Khaisan, Hung Te Ping, Hsiao Tzu-chi, and Pieh-chi. As of the , the caves were overrun with goblins.
A statue of each Sage stood within their respective cave, usually facing the entryway.
